text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: RAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hmph! You're not half bad!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I could say the same thing! I'm not<n>giving up the next
foothold to you,<n>though!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Don't you two dare forget about me!<n>LET'S GOOO!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The three Umamusume throw<n>themselves into ascending
the cliff,<n>their sights set on the chapel.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: All for the sake of proving their<n>passion...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: (I'm lacking oomph, huh? I'll show<n>you oomph!)

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Wow, wow, wooow! Just when I<n>thought I heard the
pitter-patter of<n>pretty little footsteps, three lovely<n>gems
show up at my doorstep! ♪

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... I'm not gonna let youturn me away this time!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Oh my. ♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: The time has come for you all to<n>propose.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
But as a penalty, you must go last, Air<n>Groove. ☆
Understood?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ngh... Understood.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
First up is Kawakami Princess. Tell<n>me—what does racewear
mean to<n>you? ☆

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Y-yes, ma'am!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
To me, racewear represents my ideal<n>self... It is the proof of
my vow to<n>become a princess with both<n>elegance and
dignity.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
In order to become a lady worthy of<n>exquisite attire and to
be discovered<n>by my very own Prince Charming one<n>day...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I vow to continue walking side by<n>side with my racewear,
no matter how<n>challenging the path may be!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Hmmm, very good! ♪ What a lovely<n>vow, my dear!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Next, Mejiro Dober. Let's hearyour beautiful vow! ☆

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Y-yes, ma'am!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I don't have a clear dream like<n>Kawakami... but I do want to
become a<n>better version of myself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I want to be proud of myself and run<n>my races with
confidence. I want to be<n>able to do my very best against
every<n>opponent I meet.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I want to become an undefeatable<n>Umamusume who can
stand against<n>even my role models and other<n>Mejiro
members—and for that, I need<n>my own racewear!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
To me, my racewear is an essential<n>presence that supports
and propels<n>me forward, lacking in confidence as I<n>am.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I may still be inexperienced, but I<n>want to walk hand in hand
with my<n>racewear, so I can bloom into my full<n>potential
one day!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Sorry... That was more of a wish than<n>a vow.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I don't mind at all! ♪ I accept<n>your unique proposal!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Now, last but not least...

text_block_list.name: Young Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Then when I grow up, I'm going to be<n>like you and get a
first-rate designer to<n>create my very own racewear!

text_block_list.name: Young Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'll wear a racing costume like yours<n>and become a
beautiful and amazing<n>Umamusume just like you, Mother!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
It makes me so happy to hear you<n>say that. ♪ In that case, I
have to cheer<n>you on with all my might!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
To me, racewear represents<n>admiration. It is a symbol of
what I<n>strive to become.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Ever since I was a child, I've desired<n>to become as
beautiful as my mother,<n>and that desire has not waned.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
One day, I will don a set of racewear<n>just as beautiful as
hers and become<n>the Empress who embodies the ideal<n>
Umamusume. And to make that future<n>a reality...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I vow to continue being someone<n>worthy of her racewear... I
swear to<n>pave the path we'll walk together<n>with honor
and glory.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Hehe. ♪ A wonderful fire has lit up in<n>your eyes. ☆

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Now, it's time to announce the results<n>of the audition...

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Kawakami Princess, Mejiro Dober,<n>and Air Groove...

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: You all pass!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I did it... I was chosen to be a muse!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Oui! Félicitations, everyone! ♪ Please<n>allow me to amend
what I said before,<n>Air Groove.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Your beauty is most splendid. ♪ My<n>fountain of inspiration is
positively<n>overflowing! ☆

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm looking forward to seeing what<n>you'll create. I'm sure
our outfits will<n>be on equal footing with your<n>master's
work.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Quite right! You'd better be prepared<n>for them. ☆

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
By the way, Ms. Beauty, have you<n>seen Mayano? She
should've been<n>the first one to get here.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Hm? You girls are the only ones to<n>have reached the chapel
so far.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun, right? I wonder<n>what she is up to right
now? Hehe. ♪
